TopicTitle: Sudden crash with BDB Atlas I

Articles.Content:
I've got a problem with the Bluedog Design Bureau Atlas I with the 64 bit hack. Whenever I decouple the sustainer with the centaur as an upper stage, it crashes is there anyway for you guys to help me?

https://dl.dropboxusercontent.com/u/35083538/KSP%20(1).log

Can you please look at this? Thank you.
